title: Looking for Gold/Plat ADC/Jungle for Duo climb
body:
I am a Support main. Current 7 day stats:
Leona 70% Win rate
Nami 60% Win rate
Nautilus 67% Win rate

Currently Gold 4 with a 52% win rate. 

My in game name is un1que and I have discord and have been coached by a Master OCE Support player. I have map awareness, vision control, champion knowledge and proper engagement and target acquisition. I play to win and am looking for the same in a partner. Add me in game and we can chat and see if we are compatible :)

replies.body:
As a jg {{champion:11}} main, your champ pool makes me puke rainbow.
Add me.

I was coached by a korean Master too, so we both should have similar macro.
I want to see how 2 players coached by Masters (although different persons) fare in game
We can also remind each other

My hope is to reach Plat before season ends.
